title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Skills: Applying Alternative Teaching Methods in Physical Education Through Collaborative Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physical education theory and traditional teaching methodologies, digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Participants can explain core principles of alternative teaching methods in physical education (e.g., cooperative learning, inquiry-based learning) using a collaborative professional development model.
Learners can design lesson plans applying at least three alternative teaching methods in a digital simulation reflecting real school environments and incorporate peer feedback.
Participants can conduct mock lessons for five class sessions based on alternative teaching method implementation plans developed through group collaboration and write self/peer evaluation reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
